languages.text: "Лишь грязь льется из твоих уст, солдат. За светлыми оттенками веры и преданности ты прячешь... что же ты прячешь?"
"Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"
languages.original_text: "Лишь грязь льется из твоих уст, солдат. За светлыми оттенками веры и преданности ты прячешь... что же ты прячешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Nothing but mud is coming out of your mouth, soldier. There is something that you are hiding behind the beaming hues of faith and loyalty... what is it?"
"Nothing but mud is coming out of your mouth, soldier. There is something that you are hiding behind the beaming hues of faith and loyalty... what is it?"
"Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"
"Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"
"Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"
"Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

languages.text: "Ihr redet Unsinn, Soldat. Ihr verbergt etwas hinter strahlenden Farben des Glaubens und der Loyalität ... Was ist es?"
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr redet Unsinn, Soldat. Ihr verbergt etwas hinter strahlenden Farben des Glaubens und der Loyalität ... Was ist es?"

languages.text: « Vous avez la bouche toute boueuse, soldat. Vous cachez quelque chose derrière des teintes rayonnantes de foi et de loyauté... De quoi s'agit-il ? »
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez la bouche toute boueuse, soldat. Vous cachez quelque chose derrière des teintes rayonnantes de foi et de loyauté... De quoi s'agit-il ? »

languages.text: “你的嘴巴里灌满了泥巴，士兵。在信仰与忠诚的光辉背后，隐藏着某些东西……那究竟是什么？”
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: “你的嘴巴里灌满了泥巴，士兵。在信仰与忠诚的光辉背后，隐藏着某些东西……那究竟是什么？”

languages.text: 「あなたの口は泥にまみれていますね。信念と忠誠の輝きの裏に、何かを隠している…それは何です？」
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの口は泥にまみれていますね。信念と忠誠の輝きの裏に、何かを隠している…それは何です？」

languages.text: «Su discurso es engañoso, soldado. Está ocultando algo bajo esos resplandecientes matices de fe y lealtad... ¿De qué se trata?».
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: «Su discurso es engañoso, soldado. Está ocultando algo bajo esos resplandecientes matices de fe y lealtad... ¿De qué se trata?».

languages.text: "Yalan, ağzına yuva yapmış asker. İnanç ve sadakatin pırıl pırıl tonlarının ardına bir şey saklıyorsun. Konuş! Nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Your mouth is full of mud, soldier. You are hiding something behind beaming hues of faith and loyalty... What is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan, ağzına yuva yapmış asker. İnanç ve sadakatin pırıl pırıl tonlarının ardına bir şey saklıyorsun. Konuş! Nedir?"
